data.text:
ACCOMMODATION

Whether you're getting together with friends and family, planning a weekend getaway, making arrangements for a business trip, or dreaming of your summer vacation, you've come to the right place! We've partnered with Booking.com to offer easy, online reservations at over 1.6 million hotels, guesthouses, apartments, resorts, motels, and other properties around the world. They're so sure they offer the best possible rates that they even price match! Their customer ratings and reviews are really helpful to get the best value for your money. If you have specific travel dates or you just want to browse the accommodations on offer, use the search box at right.
